user_profile: User 2004 displays a preference for commuting with frequent visits to subway stations and train stations. As an adolescent male with a middle socioeconomic background and some schooling, he enjoys a variety of activities, including fast food, arcade games, bowling, and exploring hobby shops. Evidence suggests a routine of eating at ramen and noodle houses, with regular outings to the movies and electronics stores. User 2004 is likely to enjoy social activities, yet displays some introverted tendencies, focusing more on personal hobbies. Their agreeable nature suggests they value friendships and are likely to participate in cooperative social activities. They demonstrate conscientiousness through their regular activities, indicative of planning and routine while remaining emotionally stable and open to new experiences. Future visits may include popular locales such as local malls (POI ids 2746, 7255), eateries (POI id 5170), and outdoor spaces like parks (POI id 485).
